room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: Our group of six didn't have a clue how to go about solving the puzzles necessary to open the many locks.  We weren't told we could ask for clues and wasted much of the time allotted.  It would have been fun if we had been making decent progress!  The premise is quite brilliant.  I would suggest starting with one of the easy rooms if you've never played the game before.

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: Best date idea ever. I definitely recommend it! If it weren't cheating to do it again, I'd take everyone I know.

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: Escapism was amazing! My husband and I had so much fun working together to solve the clues. We loved the theme of the room and the really well thought out clues. It takes a real talent to create this escape room! If you're looking for something different and fun for your date night or group of friends, Escapism won't disappoint! We were even handed some PBR's before we walked in. So much fun! We plan to pass the word on to our friends!

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: Best thing to do in Portland. Super intense and so rewarding if you escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: We did the Ritual Room as a team building exercise for work and had a blast! I will definitely be going back to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: My girlfriend and I did it for our anniversary. One of the funniest hours!! We escaped with 1 min left on the clock! It was so much fun! We can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: This was a really great time to spend with the kids. We are all first timers and all enjoyed it! The puzzles were fun and definitely doable with our boys. I would highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Ritual Room" by Escapism Portland in Portland
review: We had a great time, and we look forward to trying out the other escape rooms. For anyone mulling over if you should book an event or not, do it. It is very much worth the experience and game play.
